content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Copper cable factory
No structures found

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab (position x=2.5, y=0.5) and a burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items
-  Ensure the chest is not full before extracting items
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when harvesting resources
-  Check if the inventory is full before harvesting resources

### Errors when using burners
-  Ensure the burner has enough fuel before using it

### Errors when using fluid systems
-  Ensure the fluid system is connected and has enough fluid before using it

### Errors when using electricity
-  Ensure the electricity generator is connected and has enough power before using it
